query: SELECT id, name, SUBSTRING(promptTemplate, 1, 200) as prompt_preview FROM emailTemplates WHERE name = 'Casual Insider Approach'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2sFSf5cpMcz3VU3.root --database V5mU5KaxouRWtQ7kmCeQrU --execute SELECT id, name, SUBSTRING(promptTemplate, 1, 200) as prompt_preview FROM emailTemplates WHERE name = 'Casual Insider Approach'

rows.name: Casual Insider Approach
rows.prompt_preview: You are writing an ultra-casual, insider-knowledge email to a healthcare stakeholder. The tone is peer-to-peer, not vendor-to-buyer.

stdout:
